name: PROJECT D: Human Risen
description:
In 2022 The earth is hit by the terror of extinction, where there is a new virus called the D VIRUS
triggered human extinction the researchers did not find a single solution
could prevent the virus and researchers from the world gathered to find a solution
so that humans are not extinct, one of the solutions used is the doomsday project
namely using a time capsule as a solution.

Not only that, the researchers also chose and trained teenagers who have potential
to build human civilization in the future, those who are chosen are trained to survive
in the future where humans and modern times do not exist.

2023 This project was leaked to the Republic of the time capsule became a struggle for the only amount
can be made a little, and the experts decided to put the time capsule and the project on an island
inhabited by small villages that no one knows about the D virus, how will they continue in the future?

building, crafting, survival, horror, hunting, exploring with your friends.

Features


  • Use stealth to avoid enemies or engage them directly with raw weapons built from sticks, stones and more.
  • Solve the mystery of the D VIRUS.
  • Chop down trees to build a camp or start a fire to keep warm. Scavenge food to keep yourself from starving.
  • Building defenses from animals and unknown animals.
  • Making weapons to survive and explore bunkers.
  • Looking for food at sea.
  • Building new civilizations such as electricity, ships and more.
  • Explore other islands.
